actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Packers and Stockyards Act.

summary.text: Amends the Packers and Stockyards Act to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to: (1) establish and maintain the Packers and Stockyards Administration as an agency within the Department of Agriculture; (2) appoint and supervise the Administrator of such agency; and (3) enforce and administer such Act through such agency.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Packers and Stockyards Act.
